title: Deloitte USI | Solution Advisor | Cyber & Strategic Risk Team |  3.3YoE | Gurgaon
content:
Education: BTech in Electronics and Communication from tier 3 college
Years of Experience: 3.3 
Tech Stack: Java,SpringBoot,Microservices
Prior Experience: Software Developer at Velocis Systems Pvt Ltd,Software Engineer at HCL Technologies Pvt Ltd
Date of the Offer: January 2025
Company: Deloitte USI
Title/Level: Solution Advisor
Location: Gurgaon India
Previous CTC: ₹ 8,60,000
Base Salary: ₹ 13,00,000
Signing Bonus: ₹ 50,000
Bonus: Performance-based bonus 0-10% of salary every year
Medical Insurance: ₹ 36,000 (On top of CTC)
Gratuity : ₹ 21,000 (On top of CTC)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~ ₹ 15,40,000
Benefits: New Smartphone allowance:₹25,000, Well being subsidy: ₹15,000 etc.

title: Atlassian | P40 | Bengaluru
content:
Years of Experience: 5

**Current CTC**
Base Salary : 29LPA
ESOPs : 5LPA
Title- SDE-2 (Data backend)

**Offer 1 (Startup)**
Time of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Startup
Title/Level: SDE-2 (Data backend)
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 48LPA
**ESOPs**:  $188K

**Offer 2 (Atlassian)**
Time of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Atlassian
Title/Level: SDE-2/ P40
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 50LPA
Sign-on Bonus- 5L
**RSUs**: $60K

Atlassian is lowballing in terms of RSUs. How can I negotiate better and how far can I take the numbers in negotitation?

I'll add interview experience in some time, drafting it. Thank to the community.
